name: Space
description: Space is Otherworld's L1, offering distinctive services for the needs of users. Otherworld is a Web3 social platform that enables users to create on-chain digital identities based on their interests. It provides interactive content, digital assets, and a social experience, with opportunities for creators to monetize and build communities. Backed by a major Korean entertainment company, it offers access to Kpop and Webtoon IPs, allowing users to collect and interact with exclusive content.

chains.name: Space
chains.description: Space is Otherworld's subnets, offering distinctive services for the needs of users. Fuel is a specialized token that functions as a lubricant for data transactions and enhances user interaction within Space, enabling seamless transaction.
